If I wanted a cheap, janky, see-through fabric, poorly printed shirt I could’ve just gone to SHEIN and got it for a third of the price. Literally the exact shirt is on SHEIN. Not happy with this at all it looks like a normal cotton shirt in the pictures. I’ve been deceived.

I thought that this shirt's print was very cute and reminded me of other trendy graphic baby tees. However, when it arrived, I immediately noticed the faintness in the shirt. But, when I tried it on, it was very obviously thin and a little see-through.  Also, the material is not the type that really stretches. It's not necessarily comfortable, nor does the design show nicely. Despite these issues, the shirt has potential because of its cute print and trendy style.  If you can get through the slight discomfort and don't care about the see through material, then this shirt will be alright.
The shirt is just as cute as more expensive brands. The printing and detail and durability are great.  The shirt is soft and the printing held up in the wash.  I would buy again.

I knew when I opened it I was going to love this. It’s a lightweight, comfortable shirt that’s wonderfull for summer. My only complaint is that it is a bit see through. But I will be wearing this a lot!
SUper cute little top, good deal for the price, exactly what it looks like

I was not too happy with this product.. I know it’s a baby tee but I ordered a size up so it wasn’t as tight as I thought but it was still crazy small and not flattering at all. The quality is worth it for the price but honestly would not recommend. If you are a small and don’t want that really tight fit you would have to size up to an XL.

I knew the reviews weren’t remarkable on this shirt but some of the other photos in reviews at least looked like a decent print job. The seashells are poor quality graphic printed on. The t shirt is really cheap material and see through. Seems like the type of fabric that will easily pill once worn. Overall disappointing and definitely do not recommend purchasing.
See-through, way too tight, itchy, and overall just sad quality.
Is see through but fits well

This concept is pretty cute, but simple. It's just a shirt with random imagery, or what the seller calls "vintage aesthetic." That means something, because my 15-year-old daughter wanted it, likes it, and she wears it a lot now.  The material is basic, but soft. It's good enough quality that the fit, color, and decal all have held up perfectly even after numerous wash/dry cycles.  The fit is perhaps just a bit on the small side. Looking at the product photos, I don't think it is intended to be smallish.  My daughter has fun with this shirt, and she wears it to school and out with friends. I recommend it.
The printing on it looks so cheap and bad quality

I am so excited on how this purchase went! I already knew this shirt was going to be cute but when I put it on it was also suprisingly comfortable too. I highly recommend this guys!!! I dont know if anyone would think this is helfpful or nessesarry but I got mine in a small ;)
Nice material and sizing is perfect!

I really like this shirt! The white is a little see through but not going to stop me from wearing it. The print is clear (I’ve had problems with other Amazon shirt prints in the past), shirt is super soft/cozy, and it fits very well.

I'm absolutely thrilled with my baby tee! The martini graphic is just as vibrant and adorable as shown in the photo. The image does have a plasticy glossy look to it, but personally, I don't mind. The material is thin and slightly see-through, but it doesn't come off as cheap; instead, it adds to the breezy feel of the top. Overall, I'm delighted with this top and can't wait to flaunt it everywhere I go!
I ordered a L and I’m normally a medium. The shirt is skin tight on me :( I think this is literally children’s clothes. Don’t buy it

Of all the fruity Y2K tops I've seen and bought, this one is my favorite! The screen print is soaked into the fabric (doesn't seem like it was ironed on like another one I got) and the fabric is nice and soft, and not too transparent.
Very comfy and cute! nice material and design!
The shirt is nothing like the picture, the print looks cheap, see-through and the style is way off. Don't get it!

This is bathing suit material and very cropped. Not flattering at all and looks nothing like the picture. Also very see through and you could tell they just ironed the picture onto some random shirt. Save your money, don't buy it.
Super cute baby tee. It is very supportive and the graphic on the front is exactly as pictured.
This is a great everyday tee and it’s very breathable! I recommend it for the summer and also to wear with some jeans .. looks really good on!
